name: Stegosaurus Survival
description:
Be prepared to play in the ultimate game of survival. The dinosaurs will chase you. Loaded with jurassic reptiles of all shapes and sizes, this Stegosaurus Dinosaur simulator will keep you coming back for more. Spinosaurus ,Tyrannosaurus Rex, Dilophosaurus, Trex, Triceratops, Raptor, and Pterodactyl are all included. This is a fast paced, action packed, 3D wild animal simulator.

From the ancient Jurassic period, a young stegosaurus rises. You now control his destiny. Covered in ultra hard scales, the stegasaurus is one of the strongest and most fascinating dinosaurs ever discovered. This fearsome creature needs your help in surviving the elements of the Jurassic world.

The goal of the game is to find all 4 family members, defeat all 5 bosses, and finally try your best to beat all 6 Super Dino Bosses. Dinosaur simulation at its best. Highly detailed graphics and smooth game play. Packed with super fun sounds for great gaming excitement.
The bosses includes Raptor, Triceratops, Spinosaurus, Pteranodon, Stegosaurus, and Tyrannosaurus Rex.. The more you play, the more the Dino grows. Upgrade your defense and attack skills with the points you earn from hunting. .
Top Game Features:
--- Upgrade Stegosaurus Defense and Attack
--- Survival is the key to the game
--- Fast paced and Continuous action game play
--- Defeat all 6 Dinosaur Bosses + BONUS Super Bosses
--- Huge Open Jurassic World 3D Map
--- The weather and time of day is dynamic. The longer you survive, the more changes you will experience.
--- Refill your energy by defeating the enemy dinos
Gameplay Tips:

1. Use the Mini Map in the top right corner of the screen to help you find things on the map. It shows the locations of clan members, bosses, magic books, and other enemies. Use the mini map to find the members - "M", Bosses "B"

2. You must learn how to effectively use your family members to help you defeat enemies. This is the only way you will be able to eventually win the game.   Please stop by our Facebook page and give us a like: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames   Also be sure and check out our other 3D animal simulators. We understand that the app is not perfect, and we welcome your constructive criticism. Please send your suggestions to wildfootgames@gmail.com. At Wild Foot we are looking for things we can do to improve the app. Come on! Get in the action!
